Support for keep-together.within-line="always".

item.description:

Fixed incomplete support for Unicode Word Joiner characters (U+2060 and U+FEFF).

Add support for conditional spaces in table-cells.

item.title: fop-project Code add (bug 42785)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 42785)
:
Support alignment-adjust for images. Thanks to Max Berger.

item.title: fop-project Code add (bug 41044)
item.description:
Code add by AD (fixes bug 41044)
:
Partial application of the patch in Bugzilla 41044: * addition of a generic PropertyCache to be used by all Property types that can be safely canonicalized * modified EnumProperty, StringProperty, NumberProperty, EnumNumber and FixedLength to make use of the cache infrastructure Thanks to Richard Wheeldon.

item.title: fop-project Code update (bug 41656)
item.description:
Code update by AD (fixes bug 41656)
:
Refactoring in the fo package: -> removal of the childNodes instance member in fop.fo.FObj -> addition of a firstChild instance member in fop.fo.FObj -> addition of a siblings instance member in fop.fo.FONode -> addition of a FONodeIterator interface in FONode + corresponding implementation in FObj -> changed implementations of FObj.addChildNode(), .removeChild() and .getChildNodes()

item.title: fop-project Code update (bug 42089)
item.description:
Code update by AD (fixes bug 42089)
:
Code cleanup and restructuring: Refactoring of PageSequenceLayoutManager and provide common FObj id property use Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: fop-project Code add
item.description:
Code add by AD :
Slight improvement of relative font-weight handling in the properties package.

item.title: fop-project Code update
item.description:
Code update by JM :
Updated PDF/A-1b support according to ISO-19005-1:2005/Cor.1:2007.

item.title: fop-project Code add (bug 41831)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 41831)
:
Add support for font auto-detection (easier font configuration). Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: fop-project Code update (bug 42406)
item.description:
Code update by JM (fixes bug 42406)
:
Use source resolution setting for bitmap images which don't provide their own resolution. Thanks to Hussein Shafie.

item.title: fop-project Code fix (bug 42109)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 42109)
:
Fixed the rendering of zero-width spaces for certain fonts by not generating them into the area tree. Thanks to Paul Vinkenoog.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by LF :
Fixed a problem with disappearing footnotes inside hyphenated inlines (and footnotes with hyphenated inline child).

item.title: fop-project Code add (bug 42067)
item.description:
Code add by JM (fixes bug 42067)
:
Add support for exact positioning of internal PDF links. Thanks to Paul Vinkenoog.

item.title: fop-project Code fix (bug 41434)
item.description:
Code fix by JM (fixes bug 41434)
:
Fix PDF Genaration for non-ASCII compatible locales. Thanks to Martin Kögler.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
Fix several exceptions when break-before/after is set on the first/last row of a table.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
Fix extra page break when break-before is set on both a table and its first row.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by VH :
Make keep-with-next and keep-with-previous work on fo:table.

item.title: fop-project Code add (bug 36934)
item.description:
Code add by VH, JM (fixes bug 36934)
:
Add support for the collapsing-border model in tables.

item.title: fop-project Code add
item.description:
Code add by JB :
Add support for named destinations in PDF.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a problem with keep-with-next on table-rows. Once a keep-with-next was set inside a table, the FO following the table would always be glued to the previous table.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed a problem with the auto-rotate-landscape setting in the PostScript renderer. It didn't generate the right setpagedevice command.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:
Code fix by JM :
Fixed an IllegalArgumentException for absolutely positioned block-containers with a border and no height/bpd set.

item.title: fop-project Code add
item.description:
Code add by JM :
Add support for a two-pass production for PostScript output to minimize file size. This adds images only once and adds only the fonts that are really used.

item.title: fop-project Code fix (bug 41652)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 41652)
:
If a line contained nothing but a linefeed, this didn't produce empty lines. Replaced the auxiliary zero-width box with a glue the width of a line, and shrinkable to zero-width.

item.title: fop-project Code fix (bug 40120)
item.description:
Code fix by VH (fixes bug 40120)
:
Stricter FOP user configuration checking Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

item.title: fop-project Code fix (bug 41572)
item.description:
Code fix by AD (fixes bug 41572)
:
Fix parsing 'url(...)' when the URL itself contains a bracketed part. Thanks to Erwin Tratar.

item.title: fop-project Code add
item.description:

Support for GIF images in RTF output (RTF handler, only. Does not affect the RTF library.)

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:

Fix for NPE with PNG images for RTF output.

:
Fix incorrect behaviour of the BreakingAlgorithm when some inline content is wider than the available ipd, causing a restart.

item.title: fop-project Code fix
item.description:

Fix for PDF corruption when a TrueType font with spaces in its name is embedded and no XML font metrics file for that font is used.

item.description:

:
Fix for ClassCastException when fo:wrapper was used as direct child of fo:flow. Note: "id" attributes are still not handled properly on fo:wrapper! Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey.

Added support for display-align for table-cell in RTF output.

Added support for UAX#14 type line breaking. Support does not extend across nested fo:inline elements.
